name: TINSS
description:
Having fun trying to recreate one of my favorite games from when I was a kid: "Super Sprint".

Use the mouse to select the options in the main menu and the arrow keys to accelerate/brake (up/down) and steer the car (left/right). Enjoy the drifting!

I hope you have fun with it! It's just my homework for 2D Programming subject in an Msc about Game Design so there is a lot to improve! 

Resources used in the game, a big hand for all those great creators, and thanks for your work!👇

  • Coches y Pistas
  • Kenney Racing-pack
  • Fondos de botones
  • Fondo intro y menu
  • Fuente de texto
  • Humo para los derrapes
  • Music Pixabay
